result.execSummary:
The defendant Carol L Nitka was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Carol L Nitka is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Carol L Nitka was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant to submit DNA Sample, not possess or consume alcoholic beverages
AODA and comply with any recommendations

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Carol L Nitka

records.addlTxt: Defendant discharged from probation on 1-30-20; unpaid supervision fees of $5

records.addlTxt: and Notice of Right to Seek Post Conviction Relief filed by defendant/counsel

Defendant Carol L Nitka in court with attorney Brian Severson.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 1 in 14 CF 271 and Ct. 1 in 14 CF 301, Judgment to be entered 14 CF 271, Ct. 2 dismissed and 14 CF 301, Ct. 2 and Ct. 3 dismissed,  14 CF 271, Ct. 1, Court withholds sentence, probation 5 years, 6 months jail w/Huber, Huber for work and treatment purposes, Good Time granted, Jail start date 1/30/15 at 4:30 P.M., $2,198.00 fine/costs, 36 month D.L. revocation, AODA and comply, DNA Sample and $250.00 DNA Surcharge to be provided, 36 month ignition interlock device, not possess/consume alcohol, 2 days sentence credit, 14 CF 301, Ct. 1, Court withholds sentence, probation 5 years, $518.00 costs, AODA and comply, defendant to provide DNA Sample, not possess/consume alcohol, 7 days sentence credit, bond to be applied, 14 TR 3494R dismissed,
plea/sentencing hearing on January 30, 2015 at 2:45 p.m.
Jury trial on July 23, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Carol L Nitka in court with attorney Brian Severson.  Christine M. Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Waiver of Preliminary Hearing filed. Court found probable cause, bound defendant over.  Information filed, reading waived. Defendant stood mute. Court entered not guilty plea, jury trial to be set. Bond continued.
filed by Court Reporter Chris Champeau, Initial Appearance held Sept. 8, 2014
Diposal of 2 CIB cards - bail jumping and resisting
Maintain absolute sobriety.  Not go on premises where alcohol is sold for on site consumption.  Standard felony conditions.

Defendant Carol L Nitka by video, in custody with attorney Leonie Dolch.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  $500.00 cash bond.  Maintain absolute sobriety.  Not go on premises where alcohol is sold for on site consumption.  Standard felony conditions.  Waives time limits.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 29, 2014 at 02:10 pm.  Hearing scheduled for October 23, 2014 at 02:45 pm.
